brand.name: Nano Banana Pro
brand.tagline: AI Image Generation powered by Gemini

home.heroDescription: Create stunning AI-generated images using Gemini. Build with customizable prompts, reusable avatars, and powerful image-to-image capabilities.
home.publicGalleryDescription: Explore images created by the community

promptBuilder.title: Prompt Builder
promptBuilder.description: Craft the perfect prompt with templates for lighting, camera angles, styles, and more

avatarSystem.title: Avatar System
avatarSystem.description: Create reusable avatars for consistent character generation across images

multiImage.title: Multi-Image Generation
multiImage.description: Generate up to 4 images at once with various resolutions and aspect ratios

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.recentActivityDescription: Your recent account activity and sessions
profile.quickActionsDescription: Manage your account settings and preferences

editProfile.title: Edit Profile
editProfile.description: Update your profile information. Changes will be saved to your account.
editProfile.emailCannotChange: Email cannot be changed for OAuth accounts

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Manage your account security and authentication options.
security.setPassword: Set a password for your account
security.twoFactorDescription: Add an extra layer of security
security.activeSessionsDescription: Manage devices logged into your account

apiKey.title: Google AI API Key
apiKey.description: Your API key is required for image generation. Get one from Google AI Studio
apiKey.notConfigured: No API key configured. Add your Google AI API key to start generating images.
apiKey.placeholder: Enter your Google AI API key
apiKey.updateHint: Want to update your key? Enter a new one below:
apiKey.deleteDescription: This will remove your stored API key. You will need to add a new key to continue using image generation.
apiKey.securityNote: Your API key is encrypted and stored securely. We never share your key with third parties.

generate.reviewPrompt: Review your prompt and generate images
generate.promptPlaceholder: Your prompt will appear here as you build it...
generate.addApiKeyHint: Please add your Google API key in your profile to generate images.
generate.apiKeyRequiredMessage: Please add your Google API key to generate images.

promptBuilder.title: Prompt Builder
promptBuilder.additionalHint: This will be appended to the generated prompt

presets.selectPreset: Select a preset to load or manage your saved presets
presets.saveDescription: Save your current prompt configuration as a preset to reuse later.
presets.noPresetsSavedHint: Save your current prompt configuration as a preset to reuse later.
presets.deletePresetConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this preset? This action cannot be undone.

results.title: Results
results.imagesWillAppear: Your generated images will appear here
results.buildPrompt: Build your prompt and generate images
results.refineDescription: Describe how you would like to modify the generated image
results.refinePlaceholder: e.g., Make the lighting more dramatic and add a sunset glow...

suggestions.happierExpression: Change the expression to be happier

gallery.noImagesYet: No images yet. Start generating to see your creations here!
gallery.noPublicImages: No public images yet. Be the first to share!
gallery.noUserImages: This user hasn't shared any public images yet.

avatars.title: Your Avatars
avatars.description: Manage your avatars for consistent image generation
avatars.createDescription: Create a new avatar to use as a reference image in your generations.
avatars.noAvatarsHint: Create your first avatar to use as a reference in image generation.
avatars.name: Name
avatars.namePlaceholder: e.g., John, Red Sports Car, My Cat
avatars.selectDescription: Choose an avatar to use as a reference image in your generation.

errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
errors.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
errors.invalidApiKeyMessage: Your Google API key appears to be invalid or expired. Please check your key and try again.
errors.rateLimitExceededMessage: You've exceeded the API rate limit. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
errors.apiQuotaExceededMessage: Your Google API quota has been exceeded. Please check your Google Cloud billing settings.
errors.contentPolicyViolationMessage: Your prompt was blocked due to content policy. Please modify your prompt and try again.
errors.connectionErrorMessage: There was a problem connecting to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.generationFailedMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

metadata.title: Nano Banana Pro - AI Image Generation
metadata.description: Create stunning AI-generated images using Gemini. Build with customizable prompts, reusable avatars, and powerful image-to-image capabilities.
